meta.title: Houston Independent School District / Houston ISD Homepage

meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to the homepage of the Houston Independent School District. HISD has 283 schools and 213,000 students, making it the largest district in Texas and the seventh-largest in the United States.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: houstonisd.org, Houston Independent School District, HISD, Houston ISD, Houston ISD news, HISD news
Houston Independent School District / Houston ISD Homepage
Welcome to the homepage of the Houston Independent School District. HISD has 283 schools and 213,000 students, making it the largest district in Texas and the seventh-largest in the United States.

Houston Independent School District / Houston ISD Homepage
Welcome to the homepage of the Houston Independent School District. HISD has 283 schools and 213,000 students, making it the largest district in Texas and the seventh-largest in the United States.
